scripts.migrate: source ~/venv/yimteam1.11/bin/activate && python3 manage.py migrate && python3 manage.py collectstatic
scripts.dev: source ~/venv/yimteam1.11/bin/activate && concurrently --kill-others --raw -n "py,sass,wbpck" -c "gray,green.inverse,blue.inverse" "python3 manage.py runserver" "node-sass -rw static/_scss/ --output static/css/" "webpack --watch"; exit 0
scripts.deploy: /bin/bash -c "source $HOME/venvs/yimteam1.11/bin/activate && python3 manage.py migrate && python3 manage.py collectstatic --noinput && touch ../yimteam_uwsgi.ini"
